page.title: 07Jack, who lives in Hemsworth
page.content: Jack is seventy years old and has lived in Hemsworth all his life. As a lad he used used to play on waste land which is now the Park. He used to play hide and seek or football. There has been a market in Hemsworth for as long as Jack can remember. Jack used to work at Brierly Pit and he had to walk there, about one and a half miles. He doesn't go very far now but he is never lonely as he has his goose and dog for company. Jack thinks that people are not as friendly now as they used to be.
